title: 💙🍞 H is for HEY LISTEN! SUBS EQUALS LOVE | 24hr Charity Stream next Sat. 🍞💙

embed.description: Welcome to 2Toastie4u's channel on Twitch. Watch them stream League of Legends and other content live and join the community!

body:
24 Hour Charity Stream Next Saturday 9AM EST
Playing League Now! Join the Toaster Tribe <3

replies.body: Make sure you eat/drink/etc. during those 24 hours.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=NiyeuujR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-11T04:20:19.802+0000)
>
> Make sure you eat/drink/etc. during those 24 hours.

Ty I appreciate it! It is my 4th 24 hr charity stream so I know what to expect at this point ^-^
What is charity is she benefitting?

> [{quoted}](name=Arctic Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=NiyeuujR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-11T03:33:31.803+0000)
>
> What is charity is she benefitting?

Proceeds are going to St. Judes Children's Hospital :)
